channel.title: Posts on alex's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on alex's Site

item.title: hugo quick start to build your website and deploy to github in ten minutes
item.description: Precondition mac pro brew git 1: Install Hogo brew install hugo To verify your new install: hugo version 2: Create a new site hugo new site quickstart quickstart å°±æ˜¯è‡ªå·±èµ·çš„ç›®å½•å 3: Add a Theme cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke Then, add the theme to the site configuration: echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml 4: Add Some Content hugo new posts/my-first-post.md 5: Start the Hugo server in your localhost then you can see the effect hugo server -D
